content.raw: Yeah I know this is one of my sublime plugins that does all of this on it's own (if the file is not too long) usually this is really handy. I can create a new branch and just do the diffs without the whitespace anytime so there should be no problem there. Just creating the branches so that development happens out in the open and everyone can go bug hunting or comment. In the BLACS/main.ui I had to remove some lines that broke everything in Qt5 were they important?
content.html: Yeah I know this is one of my sublime plugins that does all of this on it's own (if the file is not too long) usually this is really handy.
